title: The Atherton Project - Season 2 (1080p)
description:
~	    The Atherton Project	    ~
			   	   Season 2
_______________________________________________________________________________

National Champion, World Cup Winner, Downhill World Champion -- there isn't 
much that Gee, Dan and Rachel Atherton haven't accomplished on a mountain 
bike. These three siblings from the UK are in no way, shape, or form your 
"average family". "The Atherton Project" series brings us all their professional 
and personal dramas, as well as providing an insight into the mountain bike 
world like no other. Enjoy!
_______________________________________________________________________________
		
Season 2: 01. California Dreamin			/ 09:59	/ 1080p	/ 258 MB
		This premiere episode starts positively as we hear Darren Roberts, 
		the Athertons trainer, explain how for the first winter in two 
                years the family are actually all fit and healthy and ready to 
                tackle the season ahead.
			
	  02. European Vacation				/ 09:57	/ 1080p	/ 260 MB
		Episode 2 of The Atherton Project sees Gee and Rachel let loose in 
		Gauvia for the first round of The Maxxis Cup. Its the first race 
		of the year, and its Rachels first race in a year - will nerves get
		the better of her? 
	
	  03. Season 2 Ep. 3				/ 10:04	/ 1080p	/ 261 MB
		Episode 3 of The Atherton Project sees the whole crew gearing up 
		for the first UK National of the year in Rheola, South Wales. It's 
		Rachel's first proper race back on the bike, and having her 
                competing again raises the spirits...

	  04. Assaulting Adversity			/ 10:00	/ 1080p	/ 259 MB
		Then it's on to Maribor, Slovenia for Round 1 of the Downhill 
		World Cup. Disaster strikes for Rachel as she breaks her finger 
		in training, but this seems to make her even more determined.

	  05. Open Season				/ 10:03	/ 1080p	/ 260 MB
		Episode 5 of The Atherton Project kicks off in Vernon, New Jersey 
		for the US Open. It's a constantly-changing, notoriously 
		challenging track, and pushes the riders to their very limits.

	  06. Crash Course				/ 09:56	/ 1080p	/ 358 MB
		Episode 6 of The Atherton Project starts with some mid season 
		wheelbarrow atv fun to loosen the nerves back home in Wales.

	  07. Back Breaker				/ 10:00	/ 1080p	/ 273 MB
		Episode 7 starts back at the Athertons' home in Wales. The family
		have their own trails behind the house which they train on 
                whenever they're back home, and Dan and Gee hit the jumps.

	  08. Last Man Standing				/ 10:01	/ 1080p	/ 300 MB
		Red Bull's reality TV series 'The Atherton Project' is a 
		fly-on-the-wall show tracking the exploits of the most famous 
		family in mountain bike history. Follow British riders Dan, Gee 
		and Rachel Atherton as they come...
		 
	  09. Viva Italia				/ 10:04	/ 1080p	/ 419 MB
		This episode kicks off in Val Di Sole, Italy, for World Cup 
		Round 5. It's a race Gee could do with winning if he's going to 
		take the pressure off his title fight with Greg Minaar.

	  10. Getting The Band Back Together		/ 10:00	/ 1080p	/ 416 MB
		Gee reflects on his season so far. With it all hanging on the line 
		at the last World Cup race, he's really feeling the pressure to 
		perform. Until then it's off to Crankworx in Whistler, a welcome 
		break from the pressure and stress...

	  11. Back in the Saddle			/ 10:00	/ 1080p	/ 415 MB
		The Atherton Project kicks off with an encouraging message from 
		the injured Dan.

	  12. On a Rampage - Season finale		/ 15:30	/ 1080p	/ 615 MB
		The season finale of The Atherton Project sees Gee, with his 
		World Cup win under his belt, heading to Utah for the mother 
		of all freeride events: Red Bull Rampage. On the road, Gee and 
		the team stop off at a gun range to...
